channel.title: Denali Tech Blog - Smart Home Tips & Guides
channel.description: Expert tips, guides, and insights about smart home technology, home automation, and AV systems from Chicago's trusted smart home experts.

item.title: URC Remote Programming Guide: Get Your Universal Remote Working Perfectly
item.description: Learn how to program your URC remote control to control everything in your smart home - TV, audio, lights, shades, and more.

item.title: Smart Home Buyer's Guide: Everything You Need to Know Before Investing
item.description: Everything you need to know before investing in smart home technology. Expert tips and recommendations.

item.title: 10 Questions to Ask Your Installer Before Hiring
item.description: Make sure you're hiring the right company. Essential questions every homeowner should ask.

item.title: URC MX-990 Remote Review: Complete Analysis
item.description: Complete review of the URC MX-990 universal remote control. Learn about battery life, features, pros, cons, and whether it's right for your smart home.

item.title: Control4 SR-260 Remote Review: Complete Analysis
item.description: Complete review of the Control4 SR-260 universal remote control. Learn about battery life, features, pros, cons, and whether the SR-260 is right for your smart home.

item.description: Complete review of the Control4 NEEO remote control. Learn about battery life, features, pros, cons, and whether the NEEO is right for your smart home.
